Detailed Description

Class for testing whether two files, containing both text and numeric data, are equal, within tolerances for numeric data, ignoring line endings.

Definition at line 43 of file MixedFileCheck.h.

bool MixedFileCheck::check ( std::string &  errorMsg  )  [inline, virtual]

Check that the two files are the same, within tolerances.

Parameters:

Returns:
